user_review: I visited this restaurant to do takeout.  Since I wanted to make a picnic in a nearby park i was blown away by the savoury flavour and huge portion size.  I ordered G and received 2 imperial rolls, soup, and a mixture of vegetables, beef, and rice ,  I actually had food to take home for dinner.  Prices are very reasonable.

Mmm they have the best veggie/tofu soup ever, sooo warm and comforting. The prices are right, the portions are good and everyone that works here is adorable and helpful, awww, makes me happy every single time I come here for lunch. The service can be a bit slow, but the soup is worth it! Lots of meat, noddle choices and the shrimp options are always a solid pick as well.
